## patchOptions() function

Method used to patch options without full initialization of grid, only options are initialized

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function patchOptions(options: GridOptions): GridAction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>GridOptions</code> | Options to be used as patch |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GridAction`
